content: Red Tides is one of the Transformation Spells found within Black Myth: Wukong. It is one of the most powerful Transformations you can find within the game's early chapters, thanks to its extremely strong heavy attacks.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Red_Tides.md', within the main section titled 'Red Tides'.
The content is as follows:
Red Tides is one of the Transformation Spells found within Black Myth: Wukong. It is one of the most powerful Transformations you can find within the game's early chapters, thanks to its extremely strong heavy attacks.
